quests.title: Find Friend at the Mansion
quests.description: Locate a friend who may be at a mansion, as instructed by the quest giver.

quests.title: Find Friend at Mansion
quests.description: Locate a friend in a mansion and investigate the surroundings.

quests.title: Mansion Investigation
quests.description: Investigate the mansion to find a friend of the speaker and uncover any hidden secrets.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage discovered in the mansion’s basement.
plot_hooks.details: A secret entry concealed behind barrels and slime trails leads to a study/lab area.

plot_hooks.summary: Crystal and machine found in the hidden study.
plot_hooks.details: A crystal is located next to a machine; its purpose and connection to the teleportation incident remain unclear.
Sjaak was teleported away after interacting with the machine, raising questions about the mechanism and its effects on the party.
Despite searching the mansion, no sign of the friend was found, leaving the main objective unresolved.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage behind a beer barrel in the basement.
plot_hooks.details: The party discovered a secret doorway after manipulating a barrel, leading to a study/laboratory.

plot_hooks.summary: The purpose of the crystal found in the hidden laboratory.
plot_hooks.details: Hints suggest a crystal is involved in a device, possibly tied to money or teleportation.
Sjaak was teleported away from the laboratory, leaving the party confused about why.
The original objective was to find a friend, but no one responded inside the mansion.

plot_hooks.summary: Traces of ooze in the mansion
plot_hooks.details: Spore traces of ooze are found in the mansion, suggesting a mysterious creature or contamination.

plot_hooks.summary: Hidden passage behind a beer vat
plot_hooks.details: A concealed entrance behind a broken beer vat leads to a basement with a secret laboratory.
Inside the laboratory is a crystal and a machine that can teleport individuals, leading to an incident where someone was teleported away.

locations.name: Mansion
locations.description: A mansion of faded glory, with rooms such as bathrooms, bedrooms, and a basement.

locations.name: Basement
locations.description: The lower level of the mansion, containing a hidden passage and a secret laboratory.

locations.name: Hidden Passage
locations.description: A secret corridor behind barrels, leading to a study/lab.

locations.name: Study/ Laboratory
locations.description: A hidden room in the mansion housing a crystal and a mysterious machine.

locations.name: Hidden Laboratory
locations.description: A secret room behind a barrel, containing a crystal and a machine.

locations.name: Secret Laboratory
locations.description: A hidden study/laboratory accessed through a concealed entrance, containing a crystal and a teleportation machine.

items.name: Crystal
items.description: A crystal used within a teleportation machine.

items.name: Machine
items.description: An apparatus located in the hidden laboratory, possibly connected to the crystal.

items.name: Teleportation Machine
items.description: A machine capable of teleporting individuals, powered by the crystal.
